TopicTitle: Space Center Camera doesn't move / Cannot click buildings.

Articles.Content:
When I load the game, I can't click on any of the buildings or move the camera. It is locked with the VAB on the right, R&D on the left, and SPH straight ahead. I'm using MechJeb, KSP Interstellar, Deadly Reentry, B9 Aerospace, Tweakable Everything, KW Rocketry and Procedural Fairings.

My output_log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9d34klwbglc7o2x/output_log.txt?dl=0

Also, A very large craft crashed my game prior to this problem.

Edited January 7, 2015 by Raiden

Missing the log there, but did it persist if you left and returned the save or re-started KSP?

To be honest I don't know what causes this yet or how to fix it, it's most likely a bug but without being able to reproduce it it's harder to find out why it happens.

Missing the log there, but did it persist if you left and returned the save or re-started KSP?

To be honest I don't know what causes this yet or how to fix it, it's most likely a bug but without being able to reproduce it it's harder to find out why it happens.

I know about the log, as soon as I noticed it I updated

Here's the link https://www.dropbox.com/s/9d34klwbglc7o2x/output_log.txt?dl=0

Also, a bit off topic, but your post count is phenomenal.

And yes, I have restarted KSP and loaded different saves.

Edited January 7, 2015 by Raiden
Erm, have you had a look at the log?
Oh, different game saves don't have this problem, but my current one does. idk.
I think this is caused by firing a kerbal in the astronaut complex. Does it work with a different save?
Hmm, I sometimes have this problem too, but usually it fixes itself when I simply exit to menu and load again.

Hmm, I sometimes have this problem too, but usually it fixes itself when I simply exit to menu and load again.

Not with me. I have no solution except to reload an old backup and lose a lot of my data.

- - - Updated - - -

Actually, nvm. Now this backup does the same thing :/
This looks like some random KSP bug. Can't do a lot if that's the case.

I think this is caused by firing a kerbal in the astronaut complex. Does it work with a different save?

Never fired a kerbal, but a different save did work up to a point. Now nothing works

While there seems to be multiple causes to this bug, one of the big ones is alt-tabbing while loading KSP.

Can you try loading KSP and then not doing anything (and so leaving KSP as the focus application) until the game loads and then still see if this happens?

D.

Is this thread of any help to you?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100722-Game-locks-up-with-odd-view-of-space-centre
I've had this problem a number of times . It happened stock in v0.25 and v0.90 for me too. I have to exit and restart KSP for it to be fixed. Don't know what causes it.

Now this might possibly be totally off, but you havent all started the game through steam by any chance? Because this happens to me too, but *only* when starting through steam, as soon as I do it from KSP's directory, it is gone.
I get this a lot, primarily when a kerbal gains experience then I jump back to KSC... but a game restart fixes it for me O_o

Did you rename your Kerbals by any chance, or edit your save file in any way? I had this problem when I renamed a Kerbal I had rescued. The rescue contract still had the old name and KSP got confused and locked up.
